sentences.sContent: a very conservative attitude to education
sentences.sCn: 对待教育非常守旧的态度

sentences.sContent: an argument between reformers and conservatives in the organization
sentences.sCn: 该组织内部的改革派和保守派之争

sentences.sContent: ...wrote conservative writer Jennifer Rubin earlier this year refferring to the attack on Americans in benghazi...

exam.question: Although Asian countries are generally more _________ in social customs than Western countries, there have been several notable examples of women leaders in both China and India.

answer.explain: 句意： 尽管在社会风俗方面， 亚洲国家比西方国家保守， 但中国和印度都曾有过妇女担任领导人的突出事例。confidential： 秘密的， 机密的； comprehensive： 综合的， 广泛的； consistent： 一致的， 一贯的。

trans.tranOther: not liking changes or new ideas
someone who does not like changes in politics, ideas, or fashion
